title: grand orchardz kemayoran

text:
Setelah mencari informasi tentang hotel yang dekat dengan JIExpo di Traveloka, akhirnya Saya memutuskan untuk menginap di Hotel Orchardz Industri selama 2 malam di Jakarta. 
Mengapa harus dekat dengan JIExpo? Karena Saya datang ke Jakarta untuk menghadiri acara tahunan: International Pet & Animal Health Exhibition "Indonesia Pet Show". 
Anyway, satu hal yang menarik Saya untuk menginap di Hotel Orchardz Industri adalah review orang tentang breakfast menu atau makanan di hotel yang enak. Selain itu harga penawaran yang Saya dapat juga bisa dibilang lebih murah daripada hotel lain dengan bintang yang sama.
Staff hotel sangat friendly, check-in mudah dan cepat. Permintaan kamar sesuai dengan keinginan Saya.
Kamar cukup luas dan nyaman: bersih dan interior menarik. Bed dan bantal yang nyaman, serta TV, AC, refrigerator, dan electric water boiler yang bekerja dengan baik. Seperti standarnya, ada 2 buah botol air mineral, teh, kopi, dan gula sachet. Juga sebuah tissue.
Kamar mandi (shower) bersih dan pembuangan air juga lancar. Tidak ada genangan air ketika mandi. Hotel amenities yang disediakan ada sabun dan shampoo cair, pasta gigi, sikat gigi, dan sabun untuk cuci tangan. Handuk yang disediakan juga bersih dan wangi. Juga ada hair dryer di dalam kamar mandi.
Untuk breakfast menu memang sesuai dengan yang Saya baca. Hotel ini menyediakan berbagai macam menu yang komplit dan enak. Ada appetizer, main course, dan dessert. Ketika Saya menginap, disediakan roti panggang dengan berbagai selai, omelette, telur mata sapi, aneka bubur, bakso dan soto, nasi putih dan nasi goreng, serta lontong sayur. Untuk menu lauk ada sayur, ayam, dan ikan. Ada juga menu cereal dan susu, serta waffle, kue, pudding, dan buah-buahan. Minuman pun beraneka macam, mulai dari teh, kopi, juice buah, dan air putih.
Saya paling suka dengan menu omelette yang dimasak sesuai dengan permintaan. Ada potongan jamur, jagung manis, dan bawang bombay. Rasanya sangat-sangat enak, bahkan 1 pun tidak akan cukup.
Tidak heran kalau hotel ini memenangkan "Traveloka Hotel Awards 2018", kategori Best Guest Experience in Food Premium. Piala ini dipajang di meja receptionist. 
Untuk lokasi, hotel ini sangat strategis. Dari hotel menuju ke JIExpo lumayan dekat, juga ke pusat perbelanjaan Mega Glodok Kemayoran, dan Ancol. Cukup dengan menggunakan Grab, Anda bisa bepergian dengan nyaman dan murah.
Overall, Saya sangat merekomendasikan Hotel Orchardz Industri bagi siapapun yang hendak menginap di Jakarta.
title: Good Food & Enjoyable Stay

Pelayanan bagus, dari check in sampai pemesanan taksi semua lancar dan ramah.kunci saya tidak bekerja tapi staff housekeeping langsung membantu untuk dicetak ulang. kamar bersih, shower kencang dan air panas stabil. text:

Anda bisa mendapatkan ketenangan istirahat saat transit di hotel ini.
title: Pilihan Utama saat transit

text: Hotelnya bersih, pelayanan baik, hanya saja parkir motornya ribet. Harus muter media dulu. Kamarnya cukup luas,AC dingin, ada haur dryer, kamar mandi juga bagus. Menu sarapan lumayan. Setimpal lah sama harganya.
title: Bagus

text:
memuaskan ntuk kamar dengan budget 800rban untuk 2 malam. Walaupun airnya agak bau, mungkin karena deket laut. Diberi kamar yang jauh dari keramaian sesuai dengan request, jadi bener-bener tenang. Makan paginya juga enak. 
Hampir telat breakfast, tapi diingetin petugasnya untuk segera breakfast (ah, so sweet.. hahaha lebaayy).
title: Cheap and Comfortable Hotel

text:
Hotel yang sangat dekat dengan Jiexpo dan letak cukup strategis dengan pusat perbelanjaan Manggadua serta harga yang cukup terjangkau.
Fasilitas Hotel tidak diragukan lagi cukup baik bagi kami , Reservasi pun sangat ramah.
title: Terus Kembangkan Fasilitas

text:
hotel ini lokasinya cukuo deket sama bandara, sehingga kalo mau ke bandara nggak terlalu khawatir kena macet. juga deket sama mangga dua dan deket juga ke ancol. lumayan strategis lah...
hotelnya lumayan bagus. makanannya juga enak menurut saya. pelayanan so far ok ok aja.  gitu aja sih.
title: not bad

text: sambutan yang kurang baik ketika proses check in di front desk, tidak ada greeting dan senyum, sibuk dengan komputer dan terkesan jutek.ketika tiba di depan kamar saya merasa terganggu dengan room service yang hendak take out minibar berbarengan masuk, padahal minibar nya pun memang sudah kosong.fasilitas kamar sangat standar look old property, ac nya bergetar berisik sangat menggangu. ketika hendak memesan makanan pada room service petugas yang menerima order di telepon pun tidak informatif terkesan malas-malasan bad smile voice bicaranya,room service menu nya pun tidak tersusun rapih, banyak yang terbalik penyusunannya di beberapa page juga terdapat perbaikan coretan harga. makanan ketika breakfast cukup enak, special thaks to security pak wawan yang telah menemukan dan mengamankan kunci kendaraan saya yang hilang di area parkir. semoga service yang kurang dapat di perbaiki dan service yang sudah baik dapat di tingkatkan.
title: bad hospitality service

text: lokasi dekat dengan ji expo...sangat ok tidak terlalu jauh juga dengan mangga dua....suasana hotel cukup ramai terutama di lantai yang dekat dengan resto....menu breakfast cukup bervariasi....ok untuk bisnis trip
title: bisnis hotel

text: Tampak hotel luar meyakinkan tetapi kamar hotel sudah kurang perawatan. Rasanya kurang nyaman menginap di dalam kamar yang kurang perawatan. Sudah waktunya mulai di upgrade kamar di dalam. Ruangan pertemuan biasa saja ketika mengikuti pertemuan selama 2 hari.
title: Kamar hotel kurang perawatan

text: Hotel ini memang bisa di katakan lengkap, selain untuk beristirahat dapat juga untuk refresing untuk hiburan dan kebugaran. Beberapa hotel yang ada pada umumnya masih ada aja kekurangan dari tiga unsur ini yaitu tempat untuk beristirahat, hiburan dan kebugaran. Dengan demikian menurut saya Orchardz Hotel adalah primadona saya untuk di jadikan tujuan apabila ada tugas ke Jakarta.
title: Hotel yang sering jadi primadona kalangan wisatawan daerah

text: Lokasi strategis, fasilitas lumayan lengkap, kamarnya lumayan luas dan harganya masih terjangkau oleh batas pertanggungjawaban di kantor...sangat cocok untuk acara kantor pemerintahan...sayang signal wifi-nya agak lambat kalo dikamar
title: recomended for travelers.....

text:
Saya datang ke hotel ini dengan keluarga saya anak dan istri 
Saya sampai di hotel jam setengah dua siang
Saya ke reception mau buka kamar dia bilang harus menunggu jam 2
Jadi saya harus menunggu setengah jam
Di restorant.
Saya minta tolong anak saya lagi sakit ngantuk sekali apa tidak bisa di bantu agar lebih cepat,dia jawab tidak bisa memang sudah peraturan management 
Saya menunggu 15 menit ada tamu yang baru datang bisa langsung masuk
Saya bertanya ke reception tersebut kok dia bisa langsung masuk sedangkan saya disuruh menunggu harus sampai jam 2
Apa karena dia lebih rapi dibanding saya dalam hati saya
Bukannya di jawab di tinggal saya dia sibuk dengan komputer dan teleponnya
Saya bilang dengan reception yang lainnya saya pesan untuk 10 hari sekaligus.
Belum tentu tamu yang naik motor tidak lebih banyak uangnya di banding tamu yang naik mobil!!!
Lainnya saya cukup nyaman kamar cukup besar,toilet bersih,suasana sekitar tidak berisik.
Terkecuali dengan pelayanan resepsion yang satu itu.
title: Front desk kurang ramah(jessica)

text: Menginap disini bersama keluarga..untuk lokasi dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan mangga dua dan terdapat karaoke di lantai bawah dekat parkiran..untuk luas kamar lumayan besar dan untuk sarapan masih standar kurang begitu variatif..tapi sekarang sudah lebih besar restorannya dibanding dengan dulu karena baru saja ada renovasi
title: Lumayan

text: Pilihan yang cukup bagus bagi transit passanger, harga cukup ekonomis, lokasi sangat dekat dengan bandara, dengan fasilitas antar jemput dari dan ke bandara. Kualitas kamar lumayan dan pelayanan cukup bagus.
title: Nice Transit Hotel

text: Hotel nyaman, strategis sangat dekat ke pusat perbelanjaan dan juga tidak jauh dari Bandara Soetta. Harga sangat terjangkau dan fasilitas lengkap, murah namun berkelas Makanan relatif enak, bersih dan bervariasi.
title: Recomended

text: Lokasi hotel ini dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan dan pemerintahan. Hanya saja kepadatan lalu lintas di sekitar hotel pada jam kerja. Kebanyakan tamu berasal dari daerah Kalimantan, bila dilihat dari bahasa yang dipergunakan. Makan pagi dengan menu yang lumayan baik. Sangat cocok untuk tamu yang memiliki kegiatan bisnis di sekitar Mangga Dua dan sekitarnya.
title: Hotel yang Dekat Mangga Dua

text: Hotel ini menjadi rekomendasi kawan-kawan daerah saya kala mau datang ke Jakarta untuk Konsultasi. Terutama karena aksesnya yang mudah dijangkau dari kantor di area Lap. Banteng, dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan Mangga Dua dan Mangga Besar. Sekaligus terjangkau kala mereka sekeluarga berlibur ke Ancol dan sekitarnya. Pelayanan yang cukup ramah dengan menu makanan yang variatif. Untuk kamar pastikan bahwa di lantai yang non smoking area.
title: Budget Hotel Yg Nyaman

text: Hotel ini menjadi pilihan bagi teman2 saya yang datang dari daerah. Hotel dengan harga kamar yang terjangkau tapi fasilitas yang memadai. Ukuran kamar yang besar, toilet yang bersih menjadi alasan utama dalam memilih hotel ini. Lokasi hotel yang dengan dengan kawasan hiburan Mangga Besar hingga kawasan belanja Mangga Dua menjadi salah satu pertimbangannya. Menu sarapan pagi di hotel ini pun variatif dan enak. Tak heran bila restoran hotel ini sangat terkenal dengan menu Sop Buntut baik goreng, bakar hingga bumbu rica-ricanya. Hotel ini juga memiliki fasilitas hiburan seperti karaoke di lantai 5nya. Tak heran hotel ini menjadi alternatif bagi mereka yang menyukai hiburan malam...
title: Hotel Budget yang OK

text:
hotel ini bersebelahan dengan hotel sheraton media.
ruang rapat dan snacknya enak.
untuk sarapan pagi, makan siang, dan makan malam cukup variatif.
pelayan selalu standby.
kamar tidurnya nyaman, tenang, bersih.
bisa pinjem mukena dan bersih.
deket dari pusat perbelanjaan mangga dua dan pasar pagi.
title: hotel nyaman dekat pusat perbelanjaan

text: Saya memesan kamar di hotel ini melalui web check-in. Saya tiba di hotel sekitar pukul 20.00. Ketika check in, resepsionis mengatakan bahwa tipe kamar yang saya pesan adalah kamar smoking - semua kamar tipe Superior ternyata adalah smoking! - dan saya harus upgrade ke tipe yang lebih mahal untuk mendapatkan yang non-smoking. Hal ini tidak ada di web pemesanan... Staff hotel mengantar saya melihat ke dalam kamar, dan akhirnya saya tetap mengambil kamar tersebut. Kamar saya di lantai 8, agak lebih besar dari hotel kebanyakan. Furniture masih model lama dan agak kusam. Satu hal adalah AC terletak agak jauh dari bed - saya senang karena saya kadang kedinginan dengan AC hotel yang mengarah langsung ke kaki atau kepala. Toilet masih model lama, dengan volume air yang besar. Tidak disediakan sikat gigi dan pasta gigi. Saya menemukan banyak sisa abu rokok di kolong wastafel, di sudut ruangan dan bawah lemari. Wifi cepat dan lancar. Pilihan menu sarapan tidak terlalu banyak, tetapi enak!
title: Hotel standar, makanannya enak.

text: Pengalaman menginap di hotel ini karena ada kegiatan di hotel ini. Suasananya nyaman, fasiitasnya bagus untuk hotel sekelasnya. Memang tempatnya agak jauh ke mana-mana. Transtas yang saya tau ya naik taxi atau bawa mobil pribadi. Fasilitasnya bagus, kamarnya cukup luas dan bersih, kamar mandinya bersih. Menu sarapannya bermacam-macam dan cukup enak. Lumayanlah kalau mengadakan kegiatan kantor di sini.
title: Hotel Budget Ok

text:
Hotel tersebut posisi di sekitar mangga besar, mangga dua, gunung sahari, pangen jayakarta, kemayoran untuk bepergian ke daerah sekitar tersebut cocok tinggal disini karena dari segi tarif sangatlah terjangkau.

untuk kondisi kamar biasa saja tp terdapat kulkas dan hairdryer, untuk breakfast nya yang menurut saya mendingan, dan enak juga.
title: ORCHARDZ INDSUTRI

text: Kami menginap satu malam saja di hotel ini karena akan bergerak ke luar Jakarta pada hari berikutnya. Disini Traveler dapat me-request layanan pijat yang akan datang ke kamar. Lokasinya tidak terlalu dekat dengan jalan raya sehingga sedikit sulit bagi traveler untuk menemukan hotel ini. Parkir di hotel ini sangat sedikit dibandingkan dengan jumlah room yang ditawarkan.
title: Lokasi hotel tertutup tapi tetap menarik

text: Lokasinya dekat dng kemayoran dan gunung sahari..harga kamarnya cocok untuk keperluan bisnis..kamar nya cukup besar..tapi penerangannya kurang terang...kebersihan kamar juga kurang..di tempat ini juga tersedia karaoke..bs untuk melepas penat..ada juga fasilitas untuk meeting dan training....
title: Hotel budget dng fasilitas hiburan.

text: Cukup baik untuk hotel 3*. Kamar cukup bersih. Kamar mandi baik. Front Office ramah. Lokasi hotel di sekitar tidak terdapat kuliner, harus berkendara ke kawasan mangga besar atau P. Jayakarta yang aksesnya cukup macet.
title: Oke
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan Tiket.com

text:
Orchad adalah hotel ke3 yang saya kunjungi hari ini setelah hotel seraton media dan all season.Saya datang ke orchad industri atas referensi teman saya.. karena kebetulan saya sedang membandingkan beberapa hotel yang akan saya dan keluarga pakai sebelum hari H pernikahan saya. Saat saya memasuki lobby utama security tidak menyapa dan tidak tersenyum sedikitpun.lalu saya menuju meja resepsionis hendak menanyakan kamar dan paket kamar untuk pengantin ( dekor kamar pengantin utk video shoot) saat itu ada 3 staf yg berjaga..2 pake seragam dan 1 pake batik.dan mereka saling melempar tugas untuk melayani saya.. mereka acuh tak acuh menjawab saya.. dengan gaya bicara nada yang tidak sopan/Sok(padahal saat itu hanya ada saya dan pasangan sebagai tamu di meja resepsionia)bahkan saya merasa beberap x salah 1 dari mereka menyindir saya krna menanyakan kamar hotel dan terang2an mengatakan nya dengan nada tinggi didepan saya. Mereka mengatakan bahwa kamar full tanpa bertanya type kamar yang saya inginkan. Mereka berkata bahwa hanya ada kamar deluxe suit kalau saya ingin lihat show unit. Saya pun tidak masalah karena kebetulan type kamar itu yang kami mau.lalu si pria baju batik telp memanggil bellboy untuk nunjukin kamar 1022 tsb pada kami..kami pun naik ke atas..sesampai di atas kami keluar dr lift tapi anehnya si bellboy tidak ikut keluar dr lift. Kami pun menunggu dia di depaN kamar 1022 dan berusaha positif thinking.menunggu 5 menit bellboy tak kunjung datang.. lalu pasangan saya mengajak saya turun dan meninggalkan hotel.saat sampai di lantai lobby kami keluar dari lift dan berpas2an dengan si pria batik(krna kami sudah jengkel kami pura2 tidak melihat dia)saat kami melewati dia.. dia meriaki kami " woooooo yg begini nih !!" ( sungguh tidak punya sopan santun dan seperti orang tidak berpendidikan ) .. ketika kami hendak keluar dari hotel..security disitu tidak membuka kan pintu.. akhirnya saya buka pintu sendiri dengan menahan emosi. Karena baru pertama kali kesini kami tidak tau posisi exit parkiran mobil.. dan kami pun tidak melihat adanya petunjuk exit.(saat itu ada seorang satpam.. namun dia tidak beritahu kami arah yg benar)Lalu kami belok kanan (harusnya exit belok kiri) .. krna kami merasa salah jalan kami berhenti hendak bertanya pada satpam.lalu satpam menghampiri kami dan menegur dengan nada ketus " mau kemana ini ?! " lalu kami menjawab " mau keluar pak . Pintu exit dmna y ?" Lalu dia bls " exit itu di sebelah kiri !! Bukan disini ! Saya pikir mau kemana!" .. sambil menahaN emosi kami ucapkan terima kasih. Akhir nya setelah tidak mendapat perlakuan yang sopan dan pantas kami mendapatkan senyum dari seorang staff dengan berkata " 3000 pak ".. ( tukang haga karcis parkir )
Sungguh pengalaman yang buruk ! Saya berpikir orchad hotel yang bagus.. ternyata staff nya tidak punya attitude sama sekali bahkan dari atasan sampe staf terendah. Mungkin karena kami terlihat masih muda mereka berpikir bahwa kami tidak sanggup membayar biaya menginap dihotel ini sehingga
Mereka memandang rendah dan acuh tak acuh melayani kami. Bicara mereka kasar.. tidak sopan .. sungguh pengalaman terburuk saya karena pernah menginjakan kaki disini. Saya bersumpah saya dan keluarga saya tidak akan pernah menginap di hotel orchad industri !!!!!! Ini pengalaman saya.. saya tidak menyarankan utk menginap dihotel ini.. agar tidak merasakan yang saya alami.
title: Pelayanan sangat buruk!!!!

text: Layanan hotel ini sangat ramah,kamar bersih media TV OK, cukup luas serta lokasi yang strategis, dekat dengan pusat kota, hiburan dan tempat shopping, yang saya suka adalah pelayanannya yang memuaskan.
title: Hotel Orchardz Industri tempat yang nyaman
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan Raja Kamar

text:
hotel bintang 3 lokasi di jalan industri..bersebelahan dengan the media hotel & tower..
saya nginap di hotel ini tanggal 16 Mei 2013..setelah mengikuti kegiatan di media hotel & tower..
hotel ini saya pilih karena lebih murah dibanding media hotel..
cocoklah..dengan harga per malam Rp480.000 saya mendapati hotel dengan kelas bintang 3..
yang saya sesalkan ketika check ini jam 12.00 saya diberi tahu untuk menunggu sampe jam 2.00 dengan alasan yg kurang jelas...dengan penyampaian reseptionis akan mengantarkan kunci ke saya yg menunggu di restoran..
setelah mendekati jam 2.00...reseptionis tadi tak kunjung mengantarkan kunci kamar pada saya padahal saya sudah membayar duluan bahkan dengan deposit sampe Rp.700.000
saya kemudian mendatangai meja reseptionis..di depan reseptionis desk saya menemui reseptionis lain yg bertugas..
heran nya sudah hampir 30 menit saya menunggu..walah hanya bertanya "apa yg bisa saya bantu pak"  tidak pernah terucap oleh resepsionist..malahan dia sibuk dengan telepon dan mengutak-atik komputer di depannya..
saya baru mendapat jawaban setelah saya menegur reseptionist td..
tambah kesal saya...ternyata tidak ada room boy pun yang mengantarkan pelanggan ke kamar saya..padahal saya membawa barang bawaan..
sesampai di kamar..lebih parah lagi...AC sentral yg ada di kamar..bukan terasa dingin..malah terasa seperti panas..
walah...ini hotel kelas 3 atau hotel melati sih ????

bagi anda yang ingin mendapat kenyaman dengan harga yang menengah..lebih baik memilih hotel lain selain dari Orchardz Hotel jalan industri...supaya anda tidak kecewa,..
title: pelayanan paling buruk

text: Sangat terjangkau, dekat dengan pusat kota. Bagus untuk sarapan, cukup untuk bertahan hingga makan siang. Ruangan besar yang bagus namun toilet yang begitu-begitu saja. Teko tersedia namun air sedikit asin untuk teh atau kopi. Sehingga kami harus menggunakan air kemasan. Lokasi yang bagus untuk tiga perjalanan golf kami di luar kota.
title: Berharga

text: Harga yang sangat terjangkau, pelayanan yang ramah, 5-10 menit perjalanan dengan mobil dari pusat kota jakarta. Spa yang bagus. Waktu cek-out diperpanjang sampai jam dua. Kamar yang sangat bersih. Kamar mandi cukup oke. Sarapan termasuk. Penginapan yang baik secara keseluruhan.
title: Nilai yang sangat bagus

text: Sekilas... hotel ini tampak bagus dan nyaman. Namun, karyawannya membuat pengalaman ini menjadi mengerikan. Mereka tidak bisa berbicara Bahasa Inggris sehingga tak mampu memberi tahu kami tentang tempat untuk di kunjungi dan aktivitas yang bisa dilakukan di kawasan tersebut. Hari terakhir, kami bertanya apakah tiket penerbangan kami bisa dicetak... hal ini tidak menjadi masalah dan tanpa biaya tambahan. Ketika mereka menyerahkan cetakan tiket tersebut, resepsionisnya mengatakan bahwa kami harus membayar $2 per halaman... sangat aneh.
title: Pelayanan terhadap tamu yang sangat aneh

text:
Ini adalah tempat yang bagus untuk didatangi setelah penerbangan malam.

Pijatnya murah dengan layanan ekstra, dan mereka juga bisa pergi ke kamar kita.
Tidak buruk, setidaknya saya tidak harus tidur sendiri, tapi dengan 2 partner. Dan saya langsung mendapatkan teman. Hore.

Sangat direkomendasikan jika Anda mencari partner lokal secara instan.
title: Surga pijat

text:
Layanan ok, tidak ada hal yang luar biasa.
Kamar lumayan besar, posisi ac tepat menuju ke kepala saat tidur. Jadi harus mengarahkan swing ac ke bawah.
Lokasi agak jauh, tetapi untuk anda yang gila shopping, cukup dengan mengendarai taxi dengan biaya sekitar 20-30rb rupiah ke mangga dua.
Kami menyukai pelayanan room service dan breakfast sangat mengesankan, enak.
title: Tidak ada yang luar biasa

text:
Saya mengulas Orchardz Jayakarta Hotel. Pertama situs web hotel ini sangat membingungkan. Meski disebutkan disana kalau dua hotel (Orchardz Hotel) merupakan milik dari perusahaan yang sama, namun, tak ada indikasi di halaman pemesanan untuk kau pilih. Jadi saya harus memesan lewat Agoda agar tidak bingung.
Menginap di Orchardz Jayakarta selama 3 malam di Kamar Superior. Segala sesuatunya bagus kecuali tidak ada wifi untuk kamar superior (poin negatif). Wifi gratis hanya di lobi dan kafe. Kamar bersih dan baru dengan banyak pilihan saluran TV. Pilihan sarapan yang disajikan terbatas, tapi enak. Layanan bisa diterima. Secara keseluruhan tak ada keluhan kecuali hanya 1 kartu kamar diberikan untuk kami pakai berdua. Harusnya diberikan 2 kartu per kamar karena kartu diperlukan untuk mengaktivasi pasokan listrik di kamar dan lift hotel mengharuskan kartu kamar untuk dipindai. Sangat merepotkan kalau salah 1 dari kami ingin keluar sendirian. Yang terakhir adalah waktu check out paling akhir hanya dibatasi sampai 1 jam secara gratis kecuali kau bersedia membayar dan menjaga kartu kamarmu karena ada denda RP35000 kalau menghilangkannya.
title: Hotel yang lumayan

text: Saya menginap 3 malam di sini pada bulan Oktober lalu. Harganya cukup terjangkau jika dibayar lewat Agoda menggunakan sistem prabayar. Sebenarnya ada 2 Hotel Orchard di Jakarta. Satu berada di Industri Raya, dan yang lainnya berada di Jayakarta. Saya mengalami beberapa kebingungan saat mencari taksi yang tepat. Kamar di sini bersih, cukup besar, dan fungsional. Lokasinya cukup bagus bagi saya. Kemungkinan saya akan menginap lagi, namun akan mencoba tempat lain di lain waktu.
title: Cukup bagus.

text:
Good place to stay when you are in north jakarta..
Clean and comfort room..
Friendly and helpful staff, feel very welcomed..
The food? Not bad at all..
Near to the JIExpo Kemayoran..
Near to the famous mall..
title: Nice place to stay in Jakarta

text:
Stayed here three nights in superior king room type. Check in process is super smooth, it doesn't take more than 5 minutes, deposit is required, but it's only 100k IDR. 
The room is spacious with a lovely view. Bathroom has standard amenities, and mounted hair dryer. There are big wardrobe closet and tall fridge. AC is well functioned, wifi connection is also fairly small. With such affordable price, the facilities are beyond expectation. 
Breakfast menus are quite various, and most of them tasty, even the vegetables dish. Those are my fav, actually. The staff were so kind and friendly.
title: Excellent stay

text: Value for money accommodation. Clean big room. Good breakfast spread included in room rate. Quiet location although the road in front is always busy. Easy access to Mangga Dua, Mangga Besar Kota and Chinatown areas.
title: Value for money accommodation in North Jakarta

text:
Stay in this hotel for a day and everything was good. When I arrived, there are nothing to complain.

Um, Maybe they need to develop their breakfast menu :) Add more sausages or at least variety of their salad.
title: Simple yet efisien

text: Clean, simple and responsive. They provide free transportation to from and to airport. Friendly staff. Serves it's purpose. No frills transit hotel. The Ibis Styles a hundred yards away or so is "better." But, these aren't destination stops. Orchardz is just fine.
title: Layover Stay

text: If you are in Jakarta city for an exposition at Kemayoran centre, you must go in this hotel. Free shuttle that brings you to the expo, in 5 minutes, room very very clean, good breakfast, good service. I'll go there again.
title: perfect for Kemayoran expo

text:
my sister booked this hotel room from Agoda for her marriage (for shooting), 6 rooms for family (Parents & pregnant women). We are apart 3 floors. 6th floor (superior),8th & 9th floor (deluxe).
The rooms ,the price, concierge is good, the hotel staff is kind
BUT there are less unpleasant things, such as :
1) The FO supervisor can't explain the deluxe difference with the superior.It has same size (m2 )& same venue BUT different price (deluxe more expensive).
He said "because we bought from agoda", so the venue is equal to superior
It sounds unpleasant for us.
2) We (Parents & pregnant women) had difficulty to the other family room, because we must to go down to the 1st floor to get to the other room on 6th,8th & 9th floor. with help another hotel staff
SO MUCH WASTING TIME
we are very dissapointed
We do not recommended others to rent this hotel rooms here for families (especially if you have "old" parents") on your wedding day (for shooting)
title: my sister booked this hotel room from Agoda for her marriage

text:
The service overall is good. But when we entered our room, we tried to lock from inside, the lock was not functioned. The technician came the next morning to repair. Food was ok. One more thing, for a big hotel like that, I thought, providing iron in every room is like basic, but nope, first, we need to request from the front table, second, for three days we stayed there, not one time we got to use the iron provided. Solution: we have to spent extra money for the pressing service from laundry (for 2 days)!
P/S: Avoid room floor that are closer to the karaoke room level
title: Just not our luck

text:

title: water

text:
I held my wedding reception at this hotel, overall stay is good enough.
The room is quite old fashioned style, no bathtub even for my executive suite room.
There's no AC in the corridor, so in the afternoon it's lil bit hot. But the AC in the room is just fine.
WiFi is fast enough for me but I think it can be more faster at the other hotel.
Their food is tasty, nice breakfast & the room service is also good. For the beverages is also good, I tried the Singapore Sling and it's just good.

Maybe they should improve the staff coordination, due to some problems that I encountered during my event & stay.
title: Good enough

text:
We arrived past 1 am, but check-in was a breeze. When we opened the door to our room (I think it was on the 5th floor), I saw that it was old and worn, but wifi was strong and so was the AC, plus it looked clean, so no big deal. But my friend who has sensitive skin started inspecting the comforters and sheets only to find the comforter had a huge yellow stain, and the sheets had numerous small stains. She called housekeeping to replace her bedding, so someone came up shortly to take them away. When he went back after half an hour, my friend saw that the housekeeper didn't replace the questionable items -- he simply washed them and probably put them in the dryer for a spin. We knew because the comforter and sheets were still damp, and all the stains were still there! My friend demanded for a replacement, not a cleaning, but the housekeeper told her that the hotel didn't keep extra bedding. What kind of an excuse was that?

As it was past 2 am and I was already sleepy, I called the front desk to speak to the manager. When he came up, he said that we would be transferred to a different room on a higher floor (7th or 8th, I forgot). When we got there, I saw that the room was modern, new, and chic with beautiful earth tones, so I was grateful for the transfer. The bedding was clean, too. So I thought, finally, I'd be able to sleep. But no -- the AC wasn't working at all. I called housekeeping this time, and the same person who had gone up earlier to take away the dirty sheets came up again. He stood under the AC and insisted it was working -- even while he was sweating due to the heat. I got so pissed off and called the manager again. And once again, he came up then called for repairmen to work on the AC. I told him I wanted to get my money back and transfer hotels because the hotel's service was awful, but he said he couldn't refund my money because I booked via Agoda. I asked him if he could do anything to help me to make my refund claim go through, and he shrugged and said that the hotel couldn't do anything about it. Okay, fine, fair enough, but his dismissive attitude of my concern was really upsetting. A little bit of empathy would have gone a long way even if he couldn't have done anything to help. So I asked for a new room instead. He said he would look for another available room for us, then left. He never came back. The repairmen took an hour to finish working on the AC, and the manager didn't even check up on them.

It was almost 4am when I finally got to sleep, only to be awakened at around 7am by the sounds of men working outside our door. It turned out that the whole floor was being renovated, so construction was in full swing during the day. So for the four days we were there, our alarm clock was the banging and clanging heard all throughout the floor.

The only good thing about this hotel is that it's near Jiexpo, the venue for the Djakarta Warehouse Project music festival. But even then, it's not exactly walking distance. You're better off with any of the similarly-priced hotels at the nearby Mangga Dua Square because at least, you're surrounded by restaurants and shops there, unlike with Orchardz. 

And lastly, the manager working on Dec. 10, 2015 at 1am should really take a review course on hospitality.
title: Awful customer service, dirty bedding, no AC in the room, noisy construction

text:
This is about the Orchardz Industri Hotel as there are a few Orchardz hotels in Jakarta.
The rooms are very comfortable and the restaurant serves good food. WiFi in the room works o.k. but not very quick, no charge for the WiFi.
Laundry service needs to be prompted to deliver and one-day service is promised but not always done.
Pricing in the restaurant can be confusing, prices listed on the menu are not always the same as listed on the bill. Service charge is included at all times.
Be aware that when you use Grabcab or a private car to drop-off or pick-up that the guard wants to charge 4000Rp upon exiting. This is not acceptable and management should come up with a better system.
Having more than one copy of the English printed Jakarta Post newspaper would be nice as visitors do come from outside Indonesia as well.
It was a bit disappointing not to find anything special in the restaurant to celebrate Christmas. Review is based on an eight-day stay.
title: very comfortable and clean, but be alert on pricing

text:
firstly, i got aircond problem.. after waiting for almost 2 hours, they changed my room. The second room have problem with bath shower..

Another one, the facilities in room is old styles. Memang berat nanang dooh lalu, kaca nood kawe..
title: very bad

text:
I came with reservation via booking.com, turned out the hotel did not hv my reservation in their system. After few minutes of follow up they managed to give me my room.  The reception was helpful and friendly.
The room was old, clean but could be cleaner, bed was ok, room telephone wasn't working, drainage in the shower was clogged.
Buffet breakfast only came with very few options.
Concierge and housekeeping staffs were friendly and helpful.
title: Spacious Parking, Old Rooms, Friendly staffs, regardless the problem ocurred during check in

text:
Let me start with the overall look. Great, pleasant look with chandelier and stairs as you enter. Nice waiting space at the lobby with the complimentary newspapers. The doormen are pleasant and real good about smiling and opening the doors for you. Two elevators to get to your rooms and they work only with the insertion of your room key guards. A little plus for security. 

Now, the reception desk. Great staff! The folks here are very friendly and went out of their way to give suggestions for my stay. They were always there when I needed smaller change for the high rupiah notes so that I can have smaller denominations for tips. 

When I had a little internet problem in the beginning and called them, a technician was knocking on my door within 5 minutes. He fixed it and advised me on how to log in. No problems with internet after that.

The room was great. Nice bed and cozy. There’s a mini fridge in the room. 2 complimentary bottles of water/day. However, I wished the bottles were a little bigger. I finish both in one serving. I recommend getting 1.5 liter bottles from the local 7/11 or other stores and stash them in your fridge. There is also an electric kettle where you can boil your water for the coffee or tea. You get sachets of coffee, black tea, sugar, and creamer with 2 cups and spoons for fixing hot beverages. Complimentarily refilled every day of course.

There’s a safe in the room in the closet where you can keep your valuables. Slippers are also provided so that you can use them in the room. The bathroom is clean and quite big. The stand up shower is good with good water pressure and good steaming heat. The complimentary stuff in the bathroom includes disposable toothbrush with paste, bath gel, conditioning shampoo, and my most important hair dryer! The tissue box is always full. Nice thick towels which smells pleasant. Good clean feeling when you walk out after taking a shower. 

Housekeeping staff was hardworking and did a great job of cleaning the room. I always left a tip of 10,000 Rp per day. I think that helps. They deserve it anyway. 
You get a complimentary breakfast buffet every day at the Ritz Cafe. Quite a good spread of local and western food items. Fruit juices, soy milk, and water as drinks. Also, tea and coffee. There is a omelette stand where you can order your custom made omelette. The staff is friendly and the Chef (I think) is always out smiling, greeting the customers and making sure that the food pans are kept full.Though I usually had my meals at outside vendors, I also had a couple of my dinners over at the Café and they were good and actually affordable. 

The hotel also offers FREE Shuttle Services to the Expo and the Mangga Dua Mall. Just make your bookings early and you are set to go. Just be informed that it is a one-way service though. You have to take a cab back to the hotel on your own. There are scheduled times for the service. Check with the reception desk for the times and bookings.

Overall, I had a great experience at the hotel. Definitely, the place of my stay for my next visit to Jakarta!
title: GREAT HOTEL! GREAT EXPERIENCE! GREAT PRICE!

text: it's looks very new with clean and good bed with all necessary such as tooth brush, bath solution , towel etc. air on is clean and cool. great. it's has big enough room for family too. good for business too as it's convenient to have taxi just right in front of hotel car park.

text: I stay in this hotel for SIAL Interfood 2015 for almost a week. I love the location. It takes just 10 minutes to JIEXPO. It's also near to Mangga Dua Square for shopping. Physically the interior looks a bit old and the sound of people talking in the hallway can be heard from inside the bedroom. Unfortunately for me, during my stay there was a hotel renovation that's very noisy. Anyway, I love the bedroom. There's a fridge inside. The bed is soft and comfortable. The amenities is well equipped. And there's more, even though this is a 3-star hotel, the breakfast quality equals to 4-star hotel. Clearly the hotel takes much attention to this which is a good thing. My only concern is the wifi quality. It was a bit difficult to access from the bedroom, since it kept disconnected many times. But hey, I reckon the overall quality is really worth the money.

title: Good hotel

text:
For a budget hotel, Orchardz does a great job. The room was in good condition, clean and well maintained. One thing I appreciate in a hotel is a decent shower (something lacking in some Hotels ice stayed in in south east Asia), which Orchardz delivers. Breakfast for a westerner does leave a little to be deserted but it was acceptable. My Indonesian wife was very happy with her traditional breakfast. 

The bed was rather firmer than I've found in most hotels, but for a single night it was a pleasant change. More than one night though and I think my back might have started complaining.

In the end, this is our second stay in this hotel and I'm confident it won't be our last, as there are a great many bad hotels in Jakarta and this most definitely isn't one of them.
title: Great stopover Hotel

text: My room bit noisy because there is a bar at 5th floor (altough i stay at 7th), wifi some times very slow and frustrating. The staff is nice and helpfull. If you a guy and travel alone wanted to enjoy night tourism this is one good place
title: Good if like night life style

text:

I also asked for higher floor with nice view to prevent me from noises at night and they gave me everything that I wanted. There were of course, some points that still need improvement, like sheet cleanliness, room design and advertising design that shown on tv, and better furniture. However, I couldn't ask for more; still the best for it's rate, and definitely will come back.
P.S: I hope the manager provide any kind of loyalty feedback or something like that so customer can get discount for choosing this place to stay over, and over again ;)

text:
Stay 2 nights for business purpose and so far happy with the product, friendly staff and great breakfast, very worth the price

Very strategic  location surrounded by JIExpo.

recommend for budget yet comfortable business stay.
title: Comfort Business Hotel

text: Stayed for 1 night at Orchardz Hotel Industri on 25 Jan 2015. Located along Gunung Sahari. Stayed in Room 1017. Paid 530,000 IDR for a Superior Room with Kind size bed, come with breakfast. Sleep well with no problem. Did not venture to any mall nearby, but there is a mall Mangga Dua Mall/Square which is near the hotel. Took my dinner at the hotel restaurant, they serve delicious Nasi Goreng...Traffic is heavy along Gunung Sahari..
title: Good Stay

text: The hotel lobby are always crowded and its very noisy hotel as it has karaoke bar that operates up to 3am in the morning. I did not really had a good sleep, stayed here for a day. The rate of the room is cheap and the room was quite good as well. It has a nice pool side incase you want to spend your evening with drinks :)
title: Business Hotel

text:
I have stayed in the executive deluxe double for 4D3N and book directly thru hotel. I have stay in room 1014. I’ve choose this hotel because of DWP14 &  it’s just walking distance to JIExpo Kemayoran.

From the beginning made the reservation through email, I already ask for Airport Transfer but they didn’t respond at all. When I call the hotel 2 days earlier before the check in date to check my reservation, they said they can’t find my booking. I was shocked and I re-forward again my email to them.

When we arrived, our check in process was attended by a male receptionist, Mr. Kalam. He  was a little bit slow & were lacking of smile which may seem not welcoming and unfriendly to us. This is unacceptable at all as we felt very unwelcome.

The room is very spacious which is definitely great for families and groups. Huge bathroom, nice shower with good hot and cold water. The price for the room and breakfast every morning was just the cherry on top. During make a reservation, I already requested for high floor & smoking room. Given non smoking room but advised by housekeeping that no problem to smoke. 

Last day before we check out, after having our complimentary dinner at Ritz Café, I go to reception counter to enquiry about Karaoke Room & also request for wake up call for tomorrow morning. Guess what? We met with Mr. Kalam again. With no greeting (hi or good evening) then just said “ye, mau apa?” then I just ask about the Karaoke Room and he told “naik saja di atas, lantai 5, ada kaunter bole tanya disana”. And I was like @##$@#$@#% . Then he ask again “lagi mau apa?” I just request for wake up call. I wonder how came the hotel management can hired people like him? Or the hotel itself laking in providing Customer Service Training to their staff? No manner at all, no smile, unfriendly and very rudely. I hope the management will take action toward the unfriendly staff.

Check out was fast by the front desk lady, Ms. Rina.
title: Bad hospitality service

text:
Before I checked into the hotel as a business traveller, I went to many websites for review and one thing in common about this hotel is that almost all review has following things in common and I have nothing different to say:

1. Rooms are noisy until 3AM in the morning. There is a Karoeke Bar on 5th floor that is responsible for this.
2. Grand Boutique Spa hosted in this hotel is famous for all wrong reasons.
3. Hotel is situated 1 km from Mangga Dua Malls which are famous for cheap shopping.
4. Rooms are pretty cheap in rates as compared to other hotels of same rank in the vicinity
5. Bluebird taxis are available round the clock

Other than this, I could not find any other reason to return to this hotel. One thing that I really liked and would appreciate is that when I informed management about my food preference i.e. vegetarian, they allowed me to order Veg Fried Rice/ noodles in the breakfast.

In room dining is cheap as well but there is no mini bar. There is an empty working refrigerator. 

Good for short stays. Note that during rush hours, hotel is 50-70 minutes drive from/ to airport.
title: Noisy hotel, cheap rooms

text:
We stayed here for over night only before heading back to Bangkok. The good thing from this hotel was they serve an airport transport for free from coming in and going out and it's very closed to the airport 10-15 minutes drive. 

The staffs were nice, helpful and kind too because they asked us if they prepare our breakfast for take away because our flight departure time is too early in the following morning.

Recommend this hotel for those transit purposes or business trip or short stay only because there's no good around the hotel to go just for overnight stay. 

Wants to come again if there's a chance to come back to Bandung and Yogyakarta.
title: ***Over Night Only***

text:
Located near Kemayoran Exhibition Hall, a decent property, not expensive, with good facility.
Good hotel for business trip as not far from Toll gate, easy access to airport. Surrounding area not so nice, you need taxi to get around
title: An average property, located near Exhibition Hall Kemayoran

text:
We came across this place online and it appeared to be near the airport.... about 15 mins drive!  Our plan, was to arrive by train in Jakarta in the afternoon so we could beat the traffic, spend the night here and catch the early morning flight home.  Check in was fast and smooth and the hotel met our special request of a non smoking quiet room.  The desk clerks were informative, friendly and helpful.  

The room we were assigned had been designed for travelers and was hassle free!  It had mirrors for various functions.... a long dressing one and 2 more in the bedroom to avoid congestion in the bathroom.  Fighting for usage of the bathroom mirror was a common problem in other airport hotels and it was nice to dress fast without being pressured.  Besides this, they provided coffee and tea making facilities, a safe deposit box, a fridge,wi-fi, complimentary breakfast and hourly free shuttle to the airport too!   Room was spacious and clean and the prices of the room were reasonable.  Would not mind using this hotel again on our future transits!
title: Well thought out!

text: I stayed at the Orchardz Hotel for only one night on a weekday. I've had no issue with noise as previously mentioned but maybe the karaoke thing happens over weekends.The staff was friendly enough and the rooms was clean and spacious and importantly for me the hotel wasn't far from the airport.They have a shuttle going to the airport,but the service is only till 12 in the afternoon.I would stay here again if I ever had to transit through Jakarta,but wouldn't stay here for an extended period of time as the area around the hotel looks a bit iffy.
title: Reasonable...

text:
We stayed here in transit for two separate nights in early June 2014. We booked in advance and paid US$ 50 per night including breakfast. Unlike some of the reviewers, we had no problem with noise as we were on the 7th floor (room 723). There was slight traffic noise but one would have to be very neurotic to be affected by it! The room was neat, clean and spacious but basic. For US$ 50 it is a bargain. 
Food - breakfast was very good and plentiful. We only had Asian but I did see  "western" food available. Dinner very good - again we had Asian. 
Service was excellent and free wi-fi was good and sufficiently fast. 
The reason we chose this hotel is that it is only a 10 minute ride to the airport. There is a free shuttle but we chose a taxi. Anyone that knows the Jakarta traffic will chose a hotel near the airport as it can sometimes take several hours from central Jakarta to SH Airport! Our return to the hotel from shopping in Jakarta took 3 hours! My only niggling complaint is that the carpets in the corridors seem to stain very easily and the marks look very unsightly for such a new hotel. Also smoking should be more strictly controlled. Unlike the rest of the world, Indonesia seems to accept smoking. 
The bed was very comfortable. No complaints at all about the room. 
The access from and to the motorway is very quick unlike some of the other nearby hotels.  
In all a very pleasant stay, good staff, and good value. I would recommend it and will stay again.
title: Good Basic Hotel

text: Getting a good hotel at sub-USD40 is almost impossible in Jakarta...until I found this hotel some time in 2010. It was introduced to me by my regular driver in Jakarta. The rooms are clean and spacious, the amenities are basic but practical. For a little bit more, you can get the deluxe or executive rooms with better furnishings. Breakfast served is pretty basic but edible; for the price its pretty decent. It has a karaoke lounge, a spa and a salon within the hotel premises, in addition to the coffee house. The business center is located within the coffee house. Free Wifi is available at the lobby. Location wise, there's nothing much to see as the surrounding area seemed like more industrial than touristy. However, taxis are easily available round the clock at the hotel hence moving around Jakarta is a breeze from the Hotel. I would highly recommend this hotel for those travelers seeking a clean decent hotel which does not cost a bomb in Jakarta.
title: Hidden Jewel at Mangga Dua

text:
I was there for a family trip/ holiday in Oct 09. To me, the hotel is clean enough for my standard and breakfast is superbly tasty! Room is spacious and bed is comfy. Although some of the rooms are without window, but believe me, because of the large space of the room, it doesn't make you feel suffocated.

Overall, the experience of staying in this hotel has made my trip to Jakarta even more memorable that my husband and I are making another trip there in May and we will be staying in Orchardz Hotel again!
title: Loved the hotel

text:
Just to warn fellow travellers.
It's sunday morning 8am, we came back from the jazz festival at 2am and guess what, the music is blasting from the 11th floor and it is a...church service.
Yes if you stay in this hotel, first don't stay on the 6 floor it's on top of the karaoke and you can hear it, i asked to change room and ....on the 10 floor beware of the deluxe exec room as on top of you every Sunday you will hear some priest and the music, unless you like going to service of course.
Apart from that it's fine, but the hotel seems to like more money coming from celebration and so on than from its sleeping customers.
I asked to make a complaint and am still waiting from anyone to actually care...it's 8:47am!
title: Hotel or church?

text:
Stayed here for 2 nights from 3 to 5 October 2009. It is located near Mangga Dua shopping area and Ancol theme park, but not close enough to walk. From my room, I could see Mangga Dua Square and Ancol. It's right behind or beside (depending on where you are coming from) the Sheraton Media Hotel. Why I like this hotel is  because the price is so reasonable for a hotel at that location. 

Service - Check in and check out was attended to by courteous staff. And was promptly attended to despite 2-3 people right infront of me.
Room - big and clean. Tea/coffee making facilities available.
Toilet - big and clean. No bath tub but has a shower room.
Breakfast  - Not bad at all. Quite a reasonable selection - white rice with 2 main dishes; fried rice or noodles; egg station; porridge; bread; 3 types of juice; hot drinks.
Others - karaoke rooms available
Parking - ample parking space
Location - by the main road so easy to get public transport like taxi, bus or bajaj (the 3-wheel bikes)
Rate - very, very good

I highly recommend this hotel for those looking for a medium class hotel.
title: Highly recommended

text:

Last week , 24 Feb 2008 i stay in Orchardz hotel which is located in jln gajahmada (city area of pontianak) , it was a new hotel and location is very strategic. I like minimalist design of the hotel , its room and lobby, was quite suprised it was just a three star hotel , i thought it should be a 4-5 star hotel.

Stayed in deluxe room which is on the 7th floor, room is spacious and cozy with in box safety box, flat tv and the most important it has free wifi :) 

The receptionist told me that this is a wi-fi hotel , free usage of internet access in every corner , anyway i very pleased with this hotel and its service. Worth every penny ! for sure i would come back and stay in this hotel again next month :)

text:
BEWARE - The Orchardz Hotel provides only one hanging wardrobe cupboard as clothes storage for all of its various category rooms. 

My wifeand I came to Jakarta for a one week business stay, to attend the IFEX International Furniture Exhibition just ten minutes from the hotell. However we were surprised,  on taking up residence in our good sized, 32m2, Superior Double room that we had bookedat the clothes storage provision - OR RATHER, lack of it.

When I complained the Managerthat  I was appalled to find that we were expected to pile non-hanging clothes either on a 1m 60 high shelf in the wardrobe or use any flat open surface available - there is no drawer storage provided AT ALL, his reaction was to merely shrug his shoulders and respond "That's are standard furnishing". 

What is so galling is that there is adequate space between the work area and fridge/tv unit of 60-70cm that would easily accomodate a chest of drawers and unused floor space around the room could take more furniture without being cramped so there really is no excuse

One wonders who designed these rooms - certainly not someone staying for a week needing a range of clothing to accomodate various activities.

If you stay at the Orchardz for any length of time be prepared to live out of your suit case
title: Bring your own chest of drawers

text:
Our room was booked by ppl who arranged our trip. We arrived late around 10pm. After chk in and receiving the key, we (me, wife and 3yo daughter) went to our room carrying our luggages (no porter service). 
Finding and opening the room door, lo and behold! There was already a guy sleeping half naked on the bed. Apprently since we arrived late for chk in they assumed we're cancelling thus selling our BOOKED room to other guest. 
We complained abt it to reception (going down to lvl 1), then they gave us another room. Again we carry our baggages up (no porter), and found the room issued was a twin bed room instead of a kingsize room as booked and paid earlier. At this point we're already too tired to complain, so we decided to take the room. We pushed the 2 single beds adjacent and requested for 2 toothbrushes (only 1 provided) a pillow and a bedcover to make the bed safer and more comfortable (since my daughter used to sleep in the middle). The housekeeping staff came 10 mins later, only with the t/brushes. I showed him why we need the pillow and bedcover, then abt 8-10 mins later, he showed up w/ the cover, and no pillow. He didnt even arrange/make up the beds so my wife and i made it up ourselves (and all the while my lil daughter who was reLly sleepy and tired had to wait until it was done). Afterward, i tried to call operator tk try asking again about the req' pillow. Nobody picked up e phone. After 6 times redialling, some1 from reception finaly answered. I asked about the pillow, and he promised to send housekeep' staff with it. And.....nobody showed up. At this point, i assumed only desperate ppl after reading this would still consider staying in this hotel.
title: Terrible, wont recommend it

text:
Looks can be really deceiving and if you check the website for this hotel, it looks really nice and upper class..but that's where it ends really..
Giving credit where its due, the rooms are quite comfortable and spacious (2 individuals max), tv available and reasonable room service..
The downside to this is the following
Karaoke on the 1st floor with a "take away service" and noisy all night long..the 3rd floor with its own reception and checkin for "short term guests"..the back entrance facing the lifts for short stay guests to come in and out of..there are no designated nonsmoking areas so people smoke just about everywhere, lift & coffee shop..Breakfast very limited asian cuisine only..
I was only here for 2 nights and i arrived late the first night,,the 2nd day i was out the whole day visiting Mt Krakatao and got back late, and left the next morning..so i didnt have to stay too long..Lucky me
I wouldnt recommend this place for families or anyone looking to experience Indonesian culture cause you would get pretty much the wrong impression..
title: It was fine but wouldn't recommend it

text: This hotel location closed with Jakarta district center, price also reasonable. For Check in, need to wait 30  mins due to rooms not ready even at 8pm. Stayed in exe. deluxe room, rooms nicely made you. Given non smoking room but advised by housekeeping that no problem to smoke.Breakfast is standard and employee also not so attractive.
title: Nice Hotel

text: The orchadz hotel at jln industri at Rp410k is excellent on the budget in the jakarta (kota)/north  if you are doing business or on holiday. Check in and check out was a breeze. Excellent  breakfast spread for the value -has a good selection albeit asian dishes only. At breakfast there is also  an egg station. The hotel is close enough to the shopping mall Mangga besar and ancol(a disneyland copy) amusement park with all the similar trappings but in Rupiah! You have to take taxi there. For non-halal/kosher food china town is just a street away The rooms are not carpeted therefore easy to clean. The rooms are only equipped with showers only which was adequate for my stay. There is also wifi but awfulllly slowwww. Doing email is alright though. There is also cable tv if you cannot sleep at night. Best of all there is no traffic sound coming from the streets. The bed is comfy enough for me . not too hard/not too soft. They do not have a full functioning business center but can send and recieve fax. Will definetly stay again and again , Dont advise with family to stay at this hotel due to smoking nearly everywhere and no swimmig pool otherwise value for money.
title: Excellent Boutique 3*Hotel

cheers

text:
This time I had a chance to attend wedding at this hotel. I have read some reviews that were written on this hotel and expected really value for the money.

However, i was really disappointed with my experience staying at Orchardz hotel.

The room was okay, it looks clean and acceptable for the price. However, be careful of being put at Big number rooms. They literally sit on top of the hotel's night club, and the sound systems get very loud. (During this stay, many people including I, were really fed up with this and we had to go to the lobby in PJs to change roomkey - A DISASTER).

On thing people considering staying at this hotel should know, this hotel is not suitable for family stay. For a Business trip, if you have to, it's still acceptable.
title: Definitely not for kids...

text:
Being for staying in this hotel for 4 nights because I have business trip as the one of the exhibitor in Jakarta Expo Center, Kemayoran. I choose this hotel because the location only 10 minutes drive away to the Expo Center and the price is quiet reasonable. 

Before I booked the hotel, I read the reviews from Tripadvisor, even I'm not really sure but I keep continue booked the hotel. From the beginning made the reservation through email and phone, they respond very slowly and late reply (even by email they reply 2days after, I wondering how busy they are?!) when I call the hotel for check my reservation, still on hold until I ask several times for my confirmation booking :(

When we arrived, the Front Office Staff such unfriendly people especially the girl who name Novi. OMG, I'm wondering how came the hotel management can hired people like her? No manner at all, no smile, unfriendly and very late respond us upon arrival.

I'm working in Hotel as well and I know how to treat the guest. This hotel really nice but poor hospitality. The security, housekeeping and doorman such a nice person, they pay attention on you and always smile and assist you but not with the Front Office. They treat you probably based on their mood. Only 1 girl from the Front Office, her name is Kartika, she was lil bit nice and help us when we change the key.

I stay in room #923 (Deluxe Room) from 25 - 29 October 2012. The rooms was so spacious, huge bathroom, nice shower with good hot and cold water. The Internet Connection was really good, working properly on my room. But it's not really quiet room - even in floor 9, you can still the noisy voice from the Karaoke Room.
I can't sleep properly, believe me (don't choose this floor) un recommended at all!! They also made the Lil project on 2 next of my rooms, which is I can hear the project a couple times..Hmm!

The Laundry: since I've been staying for 4 nights, for sure I need this service. Really strange, they put the regulation put your clothes on 8am and it will be finish on 10.00pm - no express laundry service and no dry cleaning even they put on the list. The result from the laundry it was OK even no perfume on it.

Housekeeping dept was OK, one of the staff who clean my room is Oji- he was good and express clean my room.

Breakfast: they open the restaurant (Ritz Cafe) from 06.00 - 10.00am and they will call you in 30 min before the  breakfast time finish for make sure you not missed your breakfast. The menu was OK, 4 main dish, 1 dessert, 1 egg choice at the corner, etc.
Restaurant was good, and the staff also quiet nice.

The other good things: the taxy from BlueBird is always there, this is the best things. Nice lobby, good space parking, they also have banquet for the wedding/meeting/etc, salon, atm and the location close to the shopping center.

Overall, this hotel I review so - so.. I might be probably want to back to this hotel if they 'fix' their employee specially for the Front Office staff, otherwise I'm not sure if the people want to back again or not?! Except, you don't mind for being nasty with their manner and attitude.
title: Nice Hotel but strange hospitality from the Front Office :s

photos.caption: Coffee - Tea set in my room

text:

Given a non-smoking room but filled with smokey smell.
Bed is hard. (Don't bother to change the bed sheet)
Big bathroom. Given face towels on the first day but not on the second day
Internet speed is free and ok.

BlueBird taxi is easily accessible.

The noise level is quite disturbing.
The hotel staff were joking and laugh loudly just outside the corridors.
I requested to the hotel reception to keep them quiet but it was not done.
Place the carpet dryer just outside the rooms and it was VERY noisy.
I stayed for two nights and they did the cleaning for two nights.

Hope the management is reading this review but I doubt that they will do something.
title: Strange cleaning time

text:
Last Christmas weekend, I was in Jakarta but I had booked another hotel. When we reached that other hotel, we were told that there was water supply disruption so we decided to find another hotel. The only other hotel phone number saved in my phone is Orchardz Hotel and so upon checking and was informed there was room available, we quickly rushed to Orchardz Hotel to check in (Thank God, traffic in Jakarta was smooth sailing on that Christmas Day). We took two deluxe rooms. 

It was probably our fourth or fifth time staying at Orchardz Hotel, and so far it never disappointed us. The room is clean and spacious. So was the toilet. The bed was so comfy and huge (they have king-sized bed, not queen). It's probably our good luck with this hotel, as I have read some guests complaining in this TA review column that they got smelly and noisy rooms. 

Breakfast was not bad at all, although we had to wait for a couple of minutes to get seated, and again we had to wait at the egg station for our egg orders. But the cafe was full at that time due to a huge group of tourists/guests who were also staying there. 

Check-in and check-out was a breeze. As I have mentioned in my earlier review, the location could not be better. It only took us 10 minutes to ITC Mangga Dua. I have always recommended this hotel to my friends visiting Jakarta, and I will do it again in the future.
title: No disappointment

text: The room is good and clean. But I think they need to improve their banquet menus for breakfast. But overall, it's a reasonable choice to stay in Jakarta.
title: Nice budget hotel

text: Overpriced for location and service.  Dirty with heavy mold and mildew on shower walls and room walls.  Room and halls smell like smoke and durian.  Would not stay here again, period.  Only reason we were there was for a wedding party and the two nights there was hardly bearable to put it mildly.  This is a third rate hotel in a third world country so why was I expecting more?  Probable because the star rating was a 3 star!!!
title: Bring Your Own Bleach for Mold/Mildew Removal!

text: i will tell all my friend about the good quality of this hotel

title: Good business hotel

text: We reserved the room three weeks in advance and informed them that we would be arriving on a late flight and would be checking in late - around 11pm.  They told us that it would be ok to check in this late.  When we called three days before to reconfirm that the room would be waiting there was no mention that we needed to pay anything in advance for the room.  On the day of our reservation, they called and informed us that we needed to pay in full for the room before 6pm in order to keep the reservation, and they wouldn't accept our credit card. They wanted the payment as a bank transfer from the same bank that they use!   How can we give them a transfer when we don't have an account at their bank and we are out of town?  There was no mention of this when the room was reserved.  We told them we would try to make a bank transfer, but we weren't able to.  When we called back to tell them that the attempt to transfer was unsuccessful, they rudely informed us that all the rooms had been booked - so we were stuck with nowhere to stay!  If they are going to require us to pay for the room in advance, they should have at least informed us when we made the initial reservation!  Clearly this hotel has ridiculous reservation policies and is poorly managed.
title: They cancelled our reservation and didn't inform us of their polices!

text:
Das Hotel ist wirklich nah am Flughafen. Vom Flughafen zum Hotel dauert es etwas länger, da man einen Umweg fahren muss, aber zum Flughafen sind es - je nach Verkehr - nur knapp 5 Minuten (Terminal 3) mit dem hauseigenen kostenlosen Shuttlebus, der stündlich fährt. 
Da wir sehr spät gelandet sind, bat man uns sogar an uns außerhalb der regulären Fahrzeit vom Flughafen abzuholen. Ein Taxi zum Hotel kostet übrigens 250000 Rp (ohne Handeln) und die kann man sich wirklich sparen.
Das Personal im Hotel ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, das Frühstück ist typisch indonesisch und sehr lecker. Alle Sorten von Frühstückseiern werden auf Anfrage frisch zubereitet. 
Das Zimmer (Superior Double Room) ist großzügig geschnitten und für eine Nacht gut geeignet. Für einen längeren Aufenthalt würden wir das Hotel aufgrund der Entfernung zur Stadt und dem - wenn auch nur mäßig vorhandenem - Zigarettengeruch im Zimmer nicht empfehlen.
title: Für eine Nacht perfekt!

text: CGK空港往復送迎無料でした。空港に迎うバスは1時間に1本ありまはし。ミネラルは2本サービスです。ドライヤー、冷蔵庫ありです。
title: 空港往復送迎無料ホテル

text:
September 2016. Wir haben eine Nacht für einen Zwischenstopp hier verbracht. Dafür geeignet, da das Hotel nicht so weit vom Flughafen entfernt liegt. Das Zimmer ebenso das Bad war sehr sauber. Das Hotel verfügt über ein Restaurant welches bis 23 Uhr geöffnet hat und leckere Gerichte zu recht günstigen Preisen anbietet. Am Frühstück war ebenfalls nichts auszusetzen. Kostenfrei ist der Shuttle vom und zum Flughafen. Alles hat reibungslos funktioniert und wir würden das Hotel mit gutem Gewissen erneut buchen. 

Als negativen Punkt möchte ich lediglich auf etwas hellhörige Zimmer hinweisen. Also darauf achten, dass das Zimmer sich nicht in unmittelbarer Nähe eines Aufzugs befindet.
title: Gutes Hotel für Zwischenstopp

text:
Lo abbiamo scelto perché vicino all'aeroporto ed offre servizio di navetta gratuito.
Noi siamo riusciti a prenotare il transfer solo tramite il nostro contatto in Java. Dovrebbero fornire un indirizzo mail sul sito web e non il numero di fax. Comunque ci sono venuti a prendere e riportati in aeroporto il giorno dopo. Colazione buona. Consigliato a chi arriva dall'Italia ed il giorno dopo ha un volo interno.
title: Ottimo per una notte

text: فندق جيد فقط عرفه نظيفه سعره مقبول لكن الإفطار عليه ملاحظات سي نوعا ما من حيث نظافه ونوع موقعه قرب شيراتون ميديا واقرب مول له مانجا دوا  لا أنصح به السائحين أول مره يزورون جاكرتا شارع الذي به مزدحم جدا
title: فندق اوركيدز

text: 昨日から滞在してますが、部屋が改装されていて快適です。以前のデラックスルームは茶色の絨毯で部屋が暗いイメージで装備品も古かったのですが改装されて明るい部屋になってます。
title: 部屋が改装されてます

text:
Das Orchardz ist gerade gut für eine Nacht zwischen zwei Flügen, da die Lage wirklich nicht schlecht ist. 
Der öffentliche Bereich besteht aus der Rezeption und einem Sitzbereich. 
Das Restaurant ist daneben angegliedert. Man kann hier etwas essen und trinken. Das Frühstück wird ebenfalls hier eingenommen. Es bietet für jeden etwas, von Toast über warme Gerichte bis hin zu frisch zubereiteten Eierspeisen. 
Die Zimmer sind eher klein, aber sauber und zweckmässig mit AC, TV und Kühlschrank eingerichtet. Leider ist es etwas hellhörig.
Das Bad ist ebenfalls sauber.
Für eine Nacht nach später Ankunft und früher Weiterreise ok.
title: Flughafenhotel für eine Nacht

text: Hotel com boa localização, muito perto do aerporto. Quartos normais, pena que o lencol nao estava tao limpo. Cobram uma taxa de consumação do freegobar porem caso nao consuma devolvem no final. Para quem vai viajar e precisa da proximidade do aerporto é bom. Cafe da manhã nao pude provar pois meu voo saia muito cedo, ele deram uma caixinha com salgadinhos.
title: Ferias

text: 市内の交通渋滞から、早朝発の飛行機に余裕をもってと、空中近くのホテルを選定、10分程度の距離だから安心です。ホテルレストランの食事もなかなかです。ボーイも気さくで、日本語でのオーダーに根気良く対応してくれました。
title: アクセス良好

text:
南部のホテルから移動してきました。
このホテルはお気に入りで頻繁に使ってます、まず値段が安い、部屋も広いし食事もまあまあです。食事で外に出るのがおっくうなときは１Fのレストランでテールスープ食べますがこれが結構美味しいです。　ランドリーだしたら必ず催促の電話しないと持ってきてくれません（笑）館内にバーやカラオケ、スパもありホテル内でもゆっくり出来ます。
title: 今年３回目の訪問

text: Een matig hotel dichtbij het vliegveld. 1 nacht is dit (net) oké. Het personeel doet zijn best, maar de snelweg locatie van een relatief gedateert hotel blijft je wel bij. Het feit dat je de volgende ochtend in een kwartier op de internationale luchthaven bent is prima. Verder, snel vergeten.
title: Hotel dichtbij het vliegveld

text:
Aunque es más sencillo llegar del hotel al aeropuerto que al revés (el acceso por carretera es un poco complicado) el hotel está genial si estás de paso por Jakarta y necesitas llegar rápido a coger un vuelo.

Un estándar bastante europeo, muy completo y bien cuidado y con un personal muy amable.
title: Buen sitio si quieres estar cerca del aeropuerto

text: Abbiamo soggiornato solamente una notte in questo hotel.Camere curate,pulite e spaziose.Buona anche la colazione.Offrono un servizio navetta gratuito per raggiungere l'aeroporto, a 10/15 minuti di auto. Nel caso doveste prendere un taxi mi raccomando, solo blue bird!!!
title: Buon Soggiorno!

text: 今回もインダストリーの方に滞在中です今回はデラックスルームではありませんが広さや環境も申し分なしです。　部屋貸しなんで朝食券も二人分付いてますので友人が朝早く迎えに来たときなど一緒に食事ができます！　食事の内容も充実していて（特に果物がおいしい）日本人でも十分です。　インターネット接続も無料でそこそこのレベルでジャカルタにしては早い方ではないでしょうか？
title: 私の定宿のひとつです

photos.caption: インターネットの接続画面

text: ジャカルタでは良く使うホテルですが昨日系列ホテルから移ってきました！ 前回はインターネットにトラブルがありましたが今回はネット環境も快適です(^^) ホテルの目の前にコンビにが出来てますが市内のスーパーより１割ほど高いです！ 朝食もおいしいですしホテル併設のスパも安くて気持ち良いですよ！
title: 昨日から滞在中です

text:
nous revenons de notre voyages de noces en indonésie et notre premier hôtel "Orchardz"
nous a bien refroidi ! chambre exécutive de luxe épouvantable, massage uniquement pour hommes ?? lounge bar affreux, pas de piscine dans cet hôtel, la restauration moyenne et le petit déjeuner est très mauvais. cet hôtel est loin des animations touristiques et le train passe à côté. je déconseille fortement ce lieu.
title: très mauvais

text: 大きなホテルのわりに値段が手ごろで朝食も美味い！ 移動のタクシーも「ブルーバード」が待機してるので安心です。  ホテル内にスパやバーもあり出不精の人にはお勧めです。
title: 朝食もお勧め

text:
とても大きなホテルで落ち着いた感じがお気に入りです、中には大きなスパも併設されておりゆったりと風呂につかりマッサージして貰うのが私腹の時間です。
値段も安くまた滞在したいホテルの一つです。
title: ｱﾝﾁｭｰﾙの大きなホテル
